content: *if you ve never tried working a mitered square pattern the homespun happy baby blanket -- available in both knit and crochet versions -- is a terrific introduction if you already know how much fun these are you ll still want to try this easy pattern squares can be joined as you go or worked separately and sewn together for a more portable project lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 830 2003 *chs-happybabyblanket pdf* skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 mc 3 balls cc1 1 ball cc2 1 ball *3 colors 5 balls total* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers *lion brand construction notes * blanket is worked by making each quarter of the inner square attached to the previously worked square for more portable project make 4 squares #1 and join with initial chain row at center then work edge knit version happy baby blanket #829 knit 1 note happy baby blanket #60505a 2 uses granny square construction 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/happy-baby-blanket-829-knit 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/happy-baby-blanket-60505a
